nodes.text: Priate was the primary star of the Mustafar system in Outer Rim Territories' Atravis sector. The star system was located along the Tosste Spur trade route, 53,000 light-years away from the Core in Standard Galactic Grid L-19. It was originally orbited by the gas giants Jestefad and Lefrani and the planet Mustafar; however, after the energies from the artifact known as the Bright Star altered Lefrani's orbit, Mustafar became suspended in an erratic path between the immense gravitational fields of the system's two gas giants, causing the planet's devastation.

Pirate first appeared in the 2005 prequel trilogy film, Star Wars: Episode III Revenge of the Sith. In the new Star Wars canon, it was identified in the 2015 magazine Star Wars: Build the Millennium Falcon 17.
